I have been playing this game since launch, and I can honestly say no other game has been quite like this one. The community is extremely passionate and involved, and while the game admittedly has its faults and issues, it is extremely enjoyable and engaging. Survivor is very fun and nuanced, and continually changes as your experience grows. Solo queues are isolating and terrifying when you first start, playing with friends is light hearted and genuinely fun. However, as personal experience grows, the more apparent it becomes that playing killer is the far more exceptional aspect of this game. It's incredible display of player psychology and time management, and truly never gets old for me. Playing different killers, experimenting with builds and constantly growing, this game has devoured my time and I would happily do it again.

В моменты отчаяния я захожу в дбд, чтобы посмотреть, что там да как. Интересно наблюдать за развитием игры, но некоторые игроки и баги (а еще действия разрабов в тщетных попытках сбалансировать геймплей) подрывают пороховую бочку, на которой я сижу. Тем не менее, в целом задумка хороша, и периодически все еще манит меня это болото.
UPD: начала играть за мана, ну не знаю, что там народ ноет по этому поводу, вообще не сложно на нем очки крови получать. Даже играя как долбокрендель (при этом без кемпинга и тоннелинга) ты можешь умудриться вынести очков больше, чем зачастую выносишь за сурва при побеге.
Паскудники, кстати, довольно часто попадаются как среди сурвов, так и среди манов. Неприятненько такое наблюдать, реально, играйте с уважением к другим, ну что вы за люди-то такие.

I've never thought about devs as stupid..but the studio who makes this game. i kinda do. They are the devs who failed kindergarden. I dont do any programming nor art design myself..but light green on transparant red i know is bad. these guys need the public to tell em that. - horrible annoying sounds, and they keep adding more of em. you need to hit a skillcheck to install the game. they have a PTS for god knows what reason. no feedback gets trough.. skill based match making? yep,..you a low rank player? yep? awesome! here! a platinum gold player for you! - why they even try to implement SBMM is for me a big question as it only counts skill as "dead, not dead" and not how well you play the game. you can kite the killer for 15mins and still get deranked. - and soon enough you need to finish a skillcheck to complete this review. Even the UI isnt lined up..they quickfixed a BAD redesign and it stayed like that..they failed all their own skillchecks if you ask me.. yet they wounder why they are losing players. DO NO BUY THIS GAME!!!!!

This game is an amazing asymmetrical game. One of the best out there, and it has a thriving player base (which I expect it to have for years to come). The game is very well balanced with only a few exceptions (some maps and the pig), allowing for each game to entertaining, thrilling, and rewarding. Also because of the balanced nature of the game, it is easy to want to play both the killer and the survivors. 
The only down side to this game is learning the killers, with no way to really test out how a killer plays with out jumping into a game. But this game is still amazing and receives a great deal of support from its developers. I highly recommend this thrilling game.
This game can give you a feeling that is very exciting, maybe you will have a little fear in earlier stage, but as you stay in touch longer and longer, you will appreciate its unique charm.

For someone that has put a lot of hours in the game........  Overall I'm Unhappy.  If you play killer, you just get hit by pallets constantly and run in loops.  Once you catch a playing survivor you just put them on hooks.  If you're survivor, you fix generators, or have killer follow you in loops so you hit them with pallet.

That's the game, repetative  in a not fun way.  Plus side, if you're a horror fan you can relive some nostalgia, but that's it.
